ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: Dinosaur
ygData.msgSnippet: BoT s a tier 3 PoP exp zone, you get there theoretically you ll have a lot of plat anyway due to your level. Personally I m level 61 and still impressed to see
ygData.messageBody:
BoT's a tier 3 PoP exp zone, you get there theoretically you'll have a lot of plat anyway due to your level.
Personally I'm level 61 and still impressed to see more than 100pp in the bank heh.
 
----- Original Message -----
From: Su
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Wednesday, March 12, 2003 12:21 AM
Subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: Dinosaur

What and where is Bastion of Thunder? Ahhh, so the money is from selling
stuff. See, I am terrible at selling stuff. I can't even zone into the
bazaar bc it puts me in chain LD hell and last time I went I had to have a
GM move me back to the nexus to get me un-stuck. Only twice have I ever
found someone willing to buy what I had for sale and even then they didn't
want to pay what the items were worth. It's just not fun for me to sit
around and auction. So selling stuff is out of the question for me.
luv,
-Su

> Alright, heres some news for you.
>
> Go to Bastion of thunder. Time the popping of nameds during offpeak hours.
> Kill the 4 nameds. You are bound to get at least 1 rune and some spectrals
> and some other neat items. Sometimes it drops a 60-100k monk staff for
> example and the runes you should be able to sell for 20k a piece if you
need
> cash. Repeat this a few days in a row.
>
> I can name maybe 20 of these places if youre into farming shit (Normally I
> dont cause cash is mostly worthless anyway, you cant buy the stuff you
want
> its not on the market but if you want cash its doable).
>
> In that farming session you will prolly get 1-2 aa while you are at it
> aswell, but this is just a bonus.
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Chirrichela Lomarcan [mailto:yssario@...]
> Sent: den 11 mars 2003 13:42
> To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
> Subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: Dinosaur
>
>
> It's kinda funny how many people will claim they can make 100k in one
night,
> but have ya ever noticed they won't say how or where?  Suuuuuuure ya do!
>
> ----- Original
>
> On one good evening of exp you can make 100k. (if you are lucky). On one
> normal evening of exp you should make at least 500-1kpp if you choose that
> type of spot (4h or so of playing).
>
>
